document.full_text: a former miss russia faced drug charges for a second time on tuesday, allegedly using stolen prescription pads to obtain painkillers and anti-anxiety drugs from pharmacies in new york.
document.title: former miss russia accused of stealing drugs
lines_and_colors: a former miss russia faced drug charges for a second time on tuesday, allegedly using stolen prescription pads to obtain painkillers and anti-anxiety drugs from pharmacies in new york.
